    • Method Detail

      • CreateRandomGoal

        public Goal CreateRandomGoal()
        Creates a new random Goal.
        Returns:
        A random goal.

      • generateAbsoluteGoal

        public Goal generateAbsoluteGoal(int difficulty)
        Generates a new absolute goal using goal generation algorithm. The difficulty of the goal is determined by the difficulty parameter and the current turn count. Every goal generated by this factory has completely different starting and ending stations from all other goals generated.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - EASY, MEDIUM or HARD constants should be used
        Returns:
        a new goal

      • generateQuantifiableGoal

        public Goal generateQuantifiableGoal(int difficulty)
        Generates a new quantifiable goal using goal generation algorithm an djikstras algorithm. The difficulty of the goal is determined by the difficulty parameter and the current turn count. Every goal generated by this factory has completely different starting and ending stations from all other goals generated. The goal will be constrained and require the player to complete it via a specific number of stations or less.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - EASY, MEDIUM or HARD constants should be used
        Returns:
        a new goal

      • generateGoal

        public Goal generateGoal(int difficulty)
        Generates either a quantifiable or absolute goal with odds 6:4 - absolute:quantifiable. The difficulty of the goal is determined by the difficulty parameter and the current turn count.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - EASY, MEDIUM or HARD constants should be used.
        Returns:
        Goal
